author: sky.cactus
content: Not recently that I know of.  It covers many of the same use cases as account abstraction, so it is unclear if it will go in an all.

author: zkfloof
content: interesting. Would you say there's a good chance EIP-2938 will go in the fork after berlin along with 1559?

author: sky.cactus
content: Unclear.  AA has been a hard sell historically.

author: timbeiko
content: If we're aiming for a Feb 24th testnet fork, what are the blocks we should set across the various testnets? I saw there was a change to EIP-2930, though. Does that change the timeline?

author: sky.cactus
content: It is hopefully a very small change for everyone.

author: ryanleeschneider
content: My personal opinion is that I'd like to see all the clients syncing on yolov3 after the 2930 change before we set testnet blocks.

author: timbeiko
content:
Opened a PR for this instead of merging directly, in case anyone has feedback: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/244

Will merge in the next day or so if no one has a strong objection.

Didn't try and change much aside from the structure. I'll probably create a separate PR at some point to update the info that's a bit out of date, but wanted to get this done sooner rather than later ðŸ™‚
